Package org.thewhitemage13.service

Class MediaValidationServiceImpl

java.lang.Object
org.thewhitemage13.service.MediaValidationServiceImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
MediaValidationServiceInterface
@Service public class MediaValidationServiceImpl extends Object implements MediaValidationServiceInterface
Service implementation for validating media resources associated with users.

This service interacts with external media and post services to verify the existence of media and to retrieve media URLs related to a specific user.

Key Responsibilities:

  • Validating the existence of a user's profile picture.
  • Fetching media URLs linked to a user's posts.
  • Handling exceptions gracefully and providing fallback results.

Dependencies:

  • MediaClient - Used to verify media existence.
  • PostClient - Used to retrieve media URLs associated with a user.
Version:
1.0.0
Author:
Mukhammed Lolo

  • Method Details

    • validateMedia

      public List<String> validateMedia(Long userId)
      Retrieves media URLs associated with the user's posts.

      Attempts to fetch media URLs from the PostClient. If the request fails, an empty list is returned.

      Specified by:
      validateMedia in interface MediaValidationServiceInterface
      Parameters:
      userId - the ID of the user whose media URLs are being retrieved
      Returns:
      a list of media URLs; an empty list if the client call fails

    • validatePicture

      public void validatePicture(CreateUserDTO createUserDTO)
      Validates the profile picture URL provided in the CreateUserDTO.

      Calls the MediaClient to check if the media resource exists. Throws a MediaNotFoundException if the media resource is not found.

      Specified by:
      validatePicture in interface MediaValidationServiceInterface
      Parameters:
      createUserDTO - the DTO containing the profile picture URL to validate
      Throws:
      org.thewhitemage13.exceptions.MediaNotFoundException - if the profile picture does not exist
